component_editor.no_field_key: This field needs a field key in order to be valid
component_editor.no_fields_dev: You'll need to create and integrate a field before you can edit content from here
component_editor.no_fields_content: The site developer will need to create and integrate a field before you can edit content from here

no-components:
You don't have any Components in your Site Library.
You can develop Components from scratch, paste them in from another site, or add some from the Primo Library.
contribute_to_community_library: Contribute a Component to the Community Library

publish.description: Your site will be uploaded as static HTML/CSS/JS files to your connected web host.
publish.download_description: You can connect a web host to publish your website directly from primo, or download it to publish it manually
